title: AI Readiness Diagnostic
description: For: CTO/COO teams needing clarity on where AI is safe. Removes: hidden decision latency and governance gaps. Delivers: readiness scorecard, workflow heat map, risk register. Timebox: 2 weeks.

title: Workflow & Decision Inventory
description: For: operations leaders with complex handoffs. Removes: unclear ownership and exception sprawl. Delivers: workflow inventory, decision ladder, exception rules. Timebox: 2–4 weeks.

title: Governance-Safe AI Operating Model
description: For: regulated teams needing HITL control. Removes: audit risk and shadow automation. Delivers: governance charter, RACI, approval checkpoints, audit trails. Timebox: 2–6 weeks.

title: Back-Office Automation (Legal, Healthcare, Ops)
description: For: back-office teams buried in intake and triage. Removes: manual routing and slow exceptions. Delivers: automation blueprint, KB object map, pilot backlog. Timebox: 3–6 weeks.
